name: Juiced Up
description:
In a world of ever-growing class tensions, play as Steeb, an intern for Big Mean Juice Company. In order to climb the corporate ladder, Steeb must overcome several internal struggles with Big Mean Juice but will need some help along the way.

Controls--------

WASD - Movement

Left Click - Shoot

Space Bar - Jump

---------------------

Original Soundtrack - https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLktYTolZr8bQw75dSyEk6P-39-SIeu7TN
